page.title: 07PLACES TO PLAY
page.content: They're going to destroy our play area.Near where I live there is an old,unused coalmine.All it's waste lies around it.My friends and I go there nearly every night to play.The biggest hill is bigger than a house and is made up of clay,coal and stone. The council recently decided to turn the area into an industrial site.We will have nowhere to play when this is done,except the cricket field,but the cricket team are always there and they send us off and tell us not to trespass.My friend's mum has organised a petition but the council hasn't yet replied.Now all our rope swings and games of hide and seek will be spoiled.Always adults get what they want.It just doesn't seem fair to me. {(VIEWS EXPRESSED BY KAREN ATKINS,AGED {13 YRS. OF HIGHFIELD) }
